attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i ask that in cases of bulling in school that in all cases both familys should be brought in and meet to come to some resolution. i believe if parents and children as well as teachers were involved bulling may begin to see an improvement in this area.
